Package ch.cern.dod.db.dao

The dao package contains the DAO classes to carry out all the operations that need access to the database.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DODInstanceDAO
    DAO for DODInstance entity.
    DODJobDAO
    DAO for DODJob entity.
    DODMonitoringDAO
    DAO for monitoring.
    DODStatsDAO
    DAO for stat objects.
    DODUpgradeDAO
    DAO for upgrade objects.

Package ch.cern.dod.db.dao Description

The dao package contains the DAO classes to carry out all the operations that need access to the database. It uses the entity package to represent the data in Java classes and the util package to obtain system-wide constants.
